Sabre dodged dropping as he avoided the attacks. Transforming quickly 
he latched onto the biting head and brought down his fist as a sword 
slid out of a hidden slot in his back...

WingRazor tackled Phenoix. "NEVER touch Sabre mechawitch!" The two 
Eagles slammed into each other as WingRazor's more advancedbody 
accepted the blow and her wings opened and began firing miniburst 
feather missiles at the pred...

Sabre smiled holding the sword to Starstorms throat. "Keep trying 
that and i'll help you breath easier miss."

NightViper deffended himself and looked up seeing Sabre attack his 
Commander... "Commander!" He transformed launching himself off 
windlord's back and Pulled his crossbow and began firing poison 
darts...

Sabre released her dodging and avoided NightViper...

(meanwhile)

Convoy poked the other two preds on the back smiling as his back duel 
cannons swung over his shoulders aimed at either of their 
heads. "Lets just the three of us chill out over here shall we?"
